En.Name: 7.62x39mm PS gzh
En.Description: A 7.62x39mm PS gzh (GAU Index - 57-N-231) cartridge with a 7.9 gram bullet with a heat-strengthened steel core with lead cladding on the tip and a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case.

Ro.Name: Test gun
Ro.Description: This is a gun for testing the server's and the client's language features
